headline: Piper Sandler Stays Neutral on Arista (ANET) Due to Valuation Concerns
summary: Arista Networks Inc. (NYSE:ANET) is one of the best data center stocks to buy now. On August 6, Piper Sandler analyst James Fish raised his price target on Arista Networks Inc. (NYSE:ANET) to $143 from $89 but kept a Neutral rating. The move followed the company’s strong Q2 results, which beat expectations across the board. Product […]
